name: Fin & Ancient Mystery
description:
New hardcore platform game.

Run, jump and fight with HUGE Bosses. 6000 people have already passed, and can you?

Join big-eared Fin on a journey across 7 magic platforming worlds, destroy 6 HUGE bosses, master the magic and save the world, cause you are the one, who has strength to do it! 

Nice and exciting action platform GAME GRAPHICS:
• Travel across BREATHTAKING levels: icy permafrost, thirsty desert, green tropics, dungeon, ruins and the world beyond time. 
• The platformer’s stages are filled with obstacles and VARIOUS TRAPS which fly, spin, shoot and strike in all possible ways.

A GREAT ADVENTURE
• Fight with UNUSUAL and dangerous enemies – a variety of MONSTERS, and even devices. 
• Find a WEAK SPOT OF EVERY BOSS and vanquish them!
